query:
SELECT 
            eg.id,
            eg.name,
            eg.timestamp,
            eg.description,
            array_agg(DISTINCT ev.id) filter (where ev.id is not null) AS events
        FROM event_groups eg
        LEFT JOIN events ev ON eg.id = ev.event_group
        WHERE eg.campaign = $1 AND ($2::int IS NULL OR ev.character = $2)
        GROUP BY eg.id
